info.title: Calculator Service
info.description: Service for multiplying numbers - Goa's teaser (with some minor additions for experimentation purposes).

get.description: Multiply two integers a and b and get the result in the response's body.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: First operand of the multiplication operation.

schema.description: First operand of the multiplication operation.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Second operand of the multiplication operation.

schema.description: Second operand of the multiplication operation.

get.description: Retrieve a JSON document containing the API's OpenAPI 2.0 definition.
Retrieve a JSON document containing the API's OpenAPI 3.0 definition.

tags.name: docs
tags.description: The docs service allows the retrieval of OpenAPI-compliant documentation.

tags.name: calc
tags.description: The calc service performs operations on numbers.
